Project.name: PureMVC Standard and Tests for C#
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation of the Standard Version and its Unit Tests for the C# language.
Project.ReleaseNotes:

Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a PureMVC_CSharp_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\PureMVC_CSharp_X_Y
